entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sprague
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sprague 10:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -20.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 59 %

Wind: NW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 30%
